data.title: Timothy West Reveals Pain Of Slowly Losing Prunella Scales To Dementia

data.text:
Actor Timothy West has spoken of the pain seeing his wife, the actress Prunella Scales, slowly slipping away into dementia.

Scales has been struggling with the disease for some years now, though the progression has been much slower than expected.

“The sad thing is that you just watch the gradual disappearance of the person you knew and loved and were very close to. If you live day to day it is manageable,” he said.

“It is when you start thinking of the past and you think 'Oh what a shame she can't do that any more', or you can't talk about this any more. Then it is sad.”

West, 81, has been married to the 'Fawlty Towers' star, now 83, for over 50 years.

He told Piers Morgan on his 'Life Stories' show that he first noticed something was wrong when Scales was performing in a play in Greenwich, south east London, and she appeared somehow less effortless.

“I thought it is not that Pru has forgotten her lines. It's that I can see her thinking. She never delayed her responses – but it was the difference from what she had always been. I knew something was wrong,” he said.

“But it took me a long time to realise what it was.”

“As the story gets around not a lot of people are rushing to employ her – but she still enjoys it,” he added.

“She can do an awful lot of radio, voice overs and she teaches. She is a very good teacher. We are essential to each other. So long may it continue.”

Asked what was the hardest part of coping with her decline, West said it is communication.

“Perhaps we have been to a concert, a play or a film and there is not much we can say about it afterwards because Pru will have a fairly hazy memory,” he said.

“She will have enjoyed her evening and she will perhaps talk about the acting. But talking about what the play is saying, she can't.

“I should think it is very frustrating for Pru. She is very kind and does not let on about it. It is frustrating for me of course. We need each other very much.”

West, who has starred in a wealth of TV shows and movies over a career spanning 56-years, married Scales in 1963.

They have three children, one of which is acclaimed actor Samuel West.
